court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM
outcome: IN CMP 1788/2020 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS, NILAMBUR CRIME NO.244/2019 OF VAZHIKKADAVU POLICE STATION, MALAPPURAM PETITIONER/1st ACCUSED: SUNIL KUMAR, AGED 50 YEARS, S/o GOPALAN, KALAPPURA
full_text: DES saa Elz 4 te IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2021/KERI64 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE P.SOMARAJAN MONDAY, THE O4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2021 / 14TH POUSHA, 1942 Cri .MC.No.4723 OF 2020 (A) AGAINST THE ORDER IN CMP 1788/2020 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS, NILAMBUR CRIME NO.244/2019 OF VAZHIKKADAVU POLICE STATION, MALAPPURAM PETITIONER/1st ACCUSED: SUNIL KUMAR, AGED 50 YEARS, S/o GOPALAN, KALAPPURAKKAL HOUSE, PONNUKKARA P.O, PUTHOOR AMSOM, THRISSUR DISTRICT. BY ADV. SRI.T.G.RAJENDRAN RESPONDENT /COMPLAINANT/STATE: 1 THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, VAZHIKKADAVU POLICE STATION, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT-679333. 2 THE STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM- 682031. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI. E.C.BINEESH THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 04.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Perl Bahai Cr1.M.C.No.4723 of 2020 2 2021/KERI64 ORDER Annexure II order passed under Section 451 Cr.P.C. is under challenge. It is an interim order passed under Section 451 Cr.P.C. Though it is not appealable, a revision is maintainable. Since there is a provision for redressing the grievance of the petitioner by way of revision, it is not proper to exhaust the remedy under Section 482 Cr.P.C. Reserving the right of petitioner to exhaust the proper remedy, the present Crl.M.C. is hereby dismissed. Sd/- P. SOMARAJAN DMR/- JUDGE BI Elz 4 te Cr1.M.C.No.4723 of 2020 3 202 1/KER/64 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S ANNEXURES: ANNEXURE TI CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIRST INFORMATION REPORT IN CRIME NO.244/2019 OF VAZHIKKADAVU POLICE STATION DATED 27.10.2019 ANNEXURE IT CERTIFIED COPY OF THE ORDER IN CMP NO.1788/2020 OF JUDICIAL 1ST CLASS MAGISTRATE, NILAMBUR DATED 23.7.2020. ANNEXURE III TRUE COPY OF THE PETITION FILED BEFORE THE JUDICIAL lst CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, NILAMBUR DATED 13.3.2020. RESPONDENTS' ANNEXURE: NIL // TRUE copy // P.A. TO JUDGE
